data.actual_result: Your screen freezes and you arent able to do anything besides force closing your client
data.short_description: Long clicking a pinged user makes your app freezes and not able to do anything anymore [Note: This happens on Latest Testflight (4331)]
data.steps_to_repro: - Make sure to ping a user or bot - long click the pinged user/or bot to get the the options of user settings etc modal. ( i suggest trying it a couple times, as it might not work directly) - tap anywhere so the user setting modal goes away - observe your frozen screen
